help.basics_tab:
üéÆ GAME BASICS

¬´Office Hacker¬ª is a simulator of working in the cybersecurity field of the company ¬´SIBERIA-SOFT¬ª.

GAME GOAL:

  • Complete daily tasks to advance your career
  • Develop cybersecurity skills
  • Earn money (rubles) and increase reputation
  • Avoid detection by the security system

INTERFACE:

The game interface consists of three main panels:

  • Left panel - employee information, balance, reputation, current task and skills
  • Central panel - terminal for executing commands
  • Right panel - surveillance camera and security system log

STARTING THE GAME:

  1. Start a new shift through the main menu
  2. Enter your first and last name when registering
  3. Complete the first task "Check the 'MAIL'"
  4. Use the terminal to complete tasks
help.terminal_tab:
‚å®Ô∏è TERMINAL COMMANDS

BASIC COMMANDS:

CommandDescriptionExample
helpShow list of all commandshelp
scanScan network for devicesscan
connect [IP]Connect to device by IP addressconnect 192.168.1.1
hack [target]Hack the specified targethack server1
tasksShow current taskstasks
clearClear terminal screenclear

ipconfigShow network settingsipconfig
whoamiCurrent user informationwhoami

USAGE TIPS:

  • Use Tab for command autocompletion
  • Use ‚Üë and ‚Üì arrows for command history navigation
  • All commands are case sensitive
  • For help on a specific command type command --help
help.controls_tab:

HOTKEYS:

CONTROL SETTINGS:

All hotkeys can be reassigned in game settings.
help.skills_tab:
üéØ SKILLS SYSTEM

Skills determine your effectiveness in various work aspects. Skill level from 1 to 10.

SKILL DESCRIPTION:

SkillDescriptionHow to improve
HackingAbility to hack systems, bypass protectionCompleting hacking tasks, using terminal
Social EngineeringAbility to manipulate employees to gain accessInteracting with NPCs, completing social tasks
ProgrammingCreating scripts, utilities and exploitsWriting code in terminal, solving programming tasks
StealthAbility to avoid detection by security systemCompleting tasks undetected, using hidden commands
AnalysisAbility to analyze data and find vulnerabilitiesAnalyzing logs, researching network packets
Network SecurityKnowledge of network protocols and protection technologiesConfiguring network equipment, protecting systems

SKILL LEVELS:

  • 1-3: Beginner - Basic knowledge
  • 4-6: Experienced - Good understanding
  • 7-8: Expert - Professional level
  • 9-10: Master - Highest level of mastery

TIPS:

  • Balance all skills development
  • Complex tasks give more experience
  • Some tasks require minimum skill levels
  • High skill levels unlock new opportunities
